trans-unit.resname: C17·13 | Portal Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C17·13 | Portal Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or permanent target attacking creature is attacking. (It can't attack its controller or its controller's planeswalkers.)
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or permanent target attacking creature is attacking. (It can't attack its controller or its controller's planeswalkers.)

trans-unit.resname: C17·19 | New Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped Vampire you control.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped Vampire you control.

trans-unit.resname: C17·19 | New Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Gain control of target creature. Change the text of that creature by replacing all instances of one creature type with Vampire.
trans-unit.target: Gain control of target creature. Change the text of that creature by replacing all instances of one creature type with Vampire.

trans-unit.resname: C17·21 | Vindictive Lich | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, choose one or more. Each mode must target a different player.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME dies, choose one or more. Each mode must target a different player.

C17·21 | Vindictive Lich | Card Text | Paragraph 3
C17·21 | Vindictive Lich | Card Text | Paragraph 4
C17·41 | Mairsil, the Pretender | Card Name
C17·41 | Mairsil, the Pretender | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact or creature card from your hand or graveyard and put a cage counter on it.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact or creature card from your hand or graveyard and put a cage counter on it.

trans-unit.resname: C17·41 | Mairsil, the Pretender | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has all activated abilities of all cards you own in exile with cage counters on them. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME has all activated abilities of all cards you own in exile with cage counters on them. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.
